# lavinmq_queues (Data Source)

List queues in a vhost.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "lavinmq_queues" "all" {
  vhost = "/"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `vhost` (String) The vhost to list queues from.

### Read-Only

- `queues` (Attributes List) List of queues in the vhost. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--queues))

<a id="nestedatt--queues"></a>
### Nested Schema for `queues`

Read-Only:

- `auto_delete` (Boolean) Whether the queue is automatically deleted when no longer used.
- `durable` (Boolean) Whether the queue should survive a broker restart.
- `name` (String) Name of the queue.
- `state` (String) State of the queue: 'running', 'paused', 'flow', 'closed', or 'deleted'.
- `vhost` (String) The vhost the queue is located in.
